#summary Notes on using the UAVXArm32F4 board without sensors as a UAVP adapter.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy,UAVXArm32F4,gke

= Introduction =

UAVXArm32F4 board may be used without sensors as a UAVP adapter. The Arm board is acting as a processor upgrade for the UAVP board and uses all the original sensors which are the analog gyros, LISL accelerometer, HMC6352 compass and BMP085 barometer.
